org.ambraproject.wombat.config

Class DelegatingTemplateLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.wombat.config.DelegatingTemplateLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SiteTemplateLoader

    public abstract class DelegatingTemplateLoader
extends Object
implements freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader
    Loads templates from a delegate TemplateLoader based on a key given in the view name.

    An instance of this class interprets the first slash-separated component of any view name passed to it as a key value that indicates how to build or choose a TemplateLoader to pass the rest to. How the key value is interpreted is defined by concrete subclasses. For example, if a controller returns the view name "foo/bar/baz.ftl", the subclass would take "foo" as the delegation key, use it to return some other TemplateLoader instance, and pass to that instance the view name "bar/baz.ftl".

        protected abstract freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader delegate(String key)
        Interpret a view key for forwarding.
        Parameters:
        key - the non-null, non-empty key containing no slashes
        Returns:
        a TemplateLoader instance to which to forward
        Throws:
        TemplateNotFoundException - if the key cannot be matched to a delegate object
